00041             static ObjectID latestGazeIntersectionObjectID();
00042 
00044             /*
00045                 The field contains the 3D point in world coordinates in meters at which the
00046                 gaze vector intersects world model object. The gaze used for intersections is the Unified Gaze Ray.
00047                 Intersection values are only logged if the GQL=3 for at least 1 eye.
00048                 Intersection coordinates are logged for both planes and spheres.
00049                 Zero coordinates represent that no possible intersection could be computed.
00050 
00051                 @if SM_COREDATA_LANGUAGE_PYTHON
00052                 def gazeObjectIntersection(self):
00053                     """Returns the 3D co-ordinates of the intersection point against the world model item in world co-ordinates.
00054 
00055                     The gaze used for intersections is the Unified Gaze Ray.
00056                     Intersection values are only logged if the GQL=3 for at least 1 eye.
00057                     Intersection coordinates are logged for both planes and spheres.
00058 
00059                     The co-ordinates are measured in meters relative to the world co-ordinate
00060                     origin and will be zero if no possible intersection could be computed.
00061                     """
00062                 @endif
00063              */
00064             virtual const fStdVector3& gazeObjectIntersection() const;
00065 
00082             virtual void setGazeObjectIntersection(const fStdVector3& object_intersection);
00083 
00084         protected:
00085              GazeIntersectionOutputDataBase();
00086 
00088             virtual void assignData(const GazeIntersectionOutputDataBase& src) COREDATA_PURE_METHOD;
00089         };
00090         typedef boost::shared_ptr<GazeIntersectionOutputDataBase> GazeIntersectionOutputDataBasePtr;
